data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=54EEnTUdgqoQ7kNvgGBNktE&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAbAXEzum8dQjWMYdjlL4IxXs4P3bK84RP7uoSMH9KqCg&oe=6659B51C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036653_1456869748359051_7076517034930849202_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=bg4O-7ypXToQ7kNvgGa44Ca&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBkyOKFtk4lXsc5VVTfSrD8KJMFgZ1KPpxkupdV9TgQ0Q&oe=6659BEA4)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003263_961033948683270_8273646164126363713_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=dkN5mkb3F1EQ7kNvgG8mU1q&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYD86R1-lk4EQfAa-ncKVts1WvDb92XhkzWBf9uV4y74Hw&oe=6659A607)

With light gameplay elements, the focus is on the narrative. Dive into a story-rich experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.  

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031579_801519894943640_3850714342256227051_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Pd2oQmzXi-UQ7kNvgG82Gh8&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBr191FsZUrnJyuNkYIAEmyMFWGeemCi7eQG8WsDLYcUQ&oe=665998E6)

![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=GuF-CzX-i9MQ7kNvgH5Ql_Z&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBTiRhTWS5hZtKlGako79U-8h8_QxH9lfv60Emo70Pw7Q&oe=6659C558)

Celebrated for its cinematic story and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75322595_315227141608157_6664541123259039926_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=XXKtBKTk38IQ7kNvgFaI12B&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAXBembmabCFH60RL9e7yZTHuHtN7gsRZx_hn7nEWX4-A&oe=6659C1D9)


![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=xM0mPbjJQy0Q7kNvgEgtGFY&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDgR_cdId3iYIjpVy-NpwgIanskx9yH7vMuKx-nImbpig&oe=6659A7F0)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57569455_779145490949371_5639970595016054333_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=x9-dItFHoRgQ7kNvgFv8A0O&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDbriQRdSqZWGLAqQpg1eBUOct1CyHTi9Xl2yAHFu7mxw&oe=6659926A)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=ZO-Kl2cFuiAQ7kNvgGFlsCL&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYD1F6j6vtEdvFqy7PWowCCo0lx5Cp1MI6qr2QQvj0tQYg&oe=6659A617)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë



![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75251817_478868781249664_4666816330504461518_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Bi5VE425HqgQ7kNvgEEmbvs&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAmL5SC4IYmAM1MiDcVqXzin7_MdUN9UN32OkpUxnit4A&oe=6659C18C)
